tosdr.case: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service

title: Instagram can store your data from adress information, even if you don't have an account.
quoteText: Things others do and information they provide about you. We also receive and analyze content, communications and information that other people provide when they use our Products. This can include information about you, such as when others share or comment on a photo of you, send a message to you, or upload, sync or import your contact information.
